name: time_series_60min_singleindex
title: Time series
description: Load, wind and solar, prices in hourly resolution

sources.title: Neon Neue Energieökonomik GmbH
sources.description: Open Power System Data is provided by Neon Neue Energieökonomik, Technical University of Berlin, ETH Zürich and DIW Berlin

_comment.dates: Dates and time must follow the ISO8601 including time zone (YYYY-MM-DD or YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss±hh)
_comment.units: Use a space between numbers and units (100 m)
_comment.languages: Languages must follow the IETF (BCP47) format (en-GB, en-US, de-DE)
_comment.licenses: License name must follow the SPDX License List (https://spdx.org/licenses/)
